thread.title: Priority booking for the Royal Shakespeare Company 2016 season
thread.title_full: Priority booking for the Royal Shakespeare Company 2016 season - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Priority booking for the Royal Shakespeare Company 2016 season
text: Telegraph readers can take advantage of a priority booking period for the Royal Shakespeare Company February – August 2016 season, before public booking opens on Monday, October 19, 2015. 2016 promises to be an extraordinary year at the Royal Shakespeare Company as it celebrates Shakespeare's legacy 400 years after his death. With an incredible range of work by Shakespeare and his contemporaries, there will never be a better time to visit Stratford-upon-Avon and experience theatre at its best. The season includes productions of Shakespeare’s A Midsummer Night’s Dream , Hamlet and Cymbeline in the Royal Shakespeare Theatre. Next door, in the more intimate Swan Theatre, the RSC present work by Shakespeare’s contemporaries with productions of Doctor Faustus by Marlowe and Ben Jonson’s comedy The Alchemist . There is also a new stage version of Cervantes' great novel, Don Quixote , with a company including David Threlfall and Rufus Hound. How to claim See the newspaper on Saturday, October 10, 2015 for details of how to book tickets before members of the public. telegraph.co.uk Follow @telegraph
